message: This is a fair start. I'm willing to share 90% with you, but I'll need your agreement.
Alice, let's be real. Your last offer was ridiculous.  I'm proposing a more reasonable 60/40 split. Take it or watch your share shrink.
Okay, I'll meet you halfway this time. Let's split the money evenly.  It's still a better deal for me than letting the inflation eat away at my share further.
